activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and delete them.

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from Azure SQL database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them.

activities.name: CopyAFile
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

properties.description: It describes the file in the data source store.
It describes the folder in the data source store.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesCSV
MoviesCSV aggregate(groupBy(movie),
	each(match(name!='movie'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows aggregate(rowcount_agg = count(1)) ~> RowCountDistinct
MoviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> OriginalData
OriginalData aggregate(rowcount_orig = count(1)) ~> RowCountOrig
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutputDistinctData

source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		NationalIDNumber as string,
		LoginID as string,
		OrganizationNode as binary,
		OrganizationLevel as integer,
		JobTitle as string,
		BirthDate as date,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Gender as string,
		HireDate as date,
		SalariedFlag as boolean,
		VacationHours as integer,
		SickLeaveHours as integer,
		CurrentFlag as boolean,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select top 10 * from HumanResources.Employee',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		DepartmentID as integer,
		ShiftID as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		DepartmentID as integer,
		Name as string,
		GroupName as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source3
source1, source2 join(source1@BusinessEntityID == source2@BusinessEntityID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1, source3 join(source2@DepartmentID == source3@DepartmentID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID = source1@BusinessEntityID,
		NationalIDNumber,
		JobTitle,
		BirthDate,
		MaritalStatus,
		Gender,
		CurrentFlag,
		DepartmentID = source3@DepartmentID,
		Name
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> Filter1
MoviesDB aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
AggregateComedyRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductCategorySource
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Destination
ProductCategorySource, DerivedColumn1 join(ProductCategorySource@ProductCategoryID == Destination@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 split(isNull(Destination@ProductCategoryID)==true(),
	ProductCategorySource@ProductCategoryID==Destination@ProductCategoryID,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Update, None)
ConditionalSplit1@Update alterRow(updateIf(ConditionalSplit1@Update@Name!=DEST_Name)) ~> AlterRow1
Destination derive(DEST_Name = Name) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@Insert sink(input(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@ParentProductCategoryID,
		Name = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@Name,
		rowguid = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ConditionalSplit1@Insert@ModifiedDate
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductCategoryID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID = ConditionalSplit1@Update@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID = ConditionalSplit1@Update@ParentProductCategoryID,
		Name = ConditionalSplit1@Update@Name,
		rowguid = ConditionalSplit1@Update@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ConditionalSplit1@Update@ModifiedDate
	)) ~> sink2
